name: Chicken Walk
description:
Oculus  VRJam 2013 finalist entry

In this game you play as a mother hen pecking at seeds and drinking water to build up your resources.

Return to a chicken coop lay eggs and hatch chicks.

When you've got a nice big family you can bank your score at a chicken coop by pecking the bank button. Bank more chicks at the same time for a higher bonus.

But beware of the fox!

Game was made for Oculus DK1 so probably won't run on modern headsets.

Game uses keyboard or gamepad.
